name: hyperspy-base
raw_recipe:
# This file created by conda-build 3.21.4
# ------------------------------------------------

package:
  name: hyperspy-base
  version: 1.6.3
source:
  fn: hyperspy-1.6.3.tar.gz
  sha256: f86807c6809ea0da489ea44d4188bf380fe460d7f6b524abc39a42ddf27f1428
  url: https://pypi.io/packages/source/h/hyperspy/hyperspy-1.6.3.tar.gz
build:
  noarch: false
  noarch_python: false
  number: '0'
  script: install.bat
  string: py36h68aa20f_0
requirements:
  build:
    - vs2017_win-64 19.16.27038 h2e3bad8_2
    - vswhere 2.8.4 h57928b3_0
  host:
    - certifi 2021.5.30 py36ha15d459_0
    - cython 0.29.23 py36he2d232f_0
    - pip 21.1.2 pyhd8ed1ab_0
    - python 3.6.13 h39d44d4_0_cpython
    - python_abi 3.6 1_cp36m
    - setuptools 49.6.0 py36ha15d459_3
    - vc 14.2 hb210afc_4
    - vs2015_runtime 14.28.29325 h5e1d092_4
    - wheel 0.36.2 pyhd3deb0d_0
    - wincertstore 0.2 py36ha15d459_1006
  run:
    - dask-core >2.1.0
    - dill
    - h5py
    - imageio
    - importlib_metadata >=3.6
    - ipyparallel
    - ipython
    - matplotlib-base >=3.1.0
    - natsort
    - numba
    - numexpr
    - numpy >=1.17.1
    - pillow >5.2
    - pint >=0.10
    - prettytable
    - python >=3.6,<3.7.0a0
    - python-dateutil >=2.5
    - python_abi 3.6.* *_cp36m
    - pyyaml
    - requests
    - scikit-image >=0.15
    - scipy >=1.1
    - sparse
    - sympy
    - tifffile >=2018.10.18
    - toolz
    - tqdm >=4.9.0
    - traits >=4.5
    - vc >=14.1,<15.0a0
    - vs2015_runtime >=14.16.27012
test:
  commands:
    - pip check
    - set MPLBACKEND=agg
    - pytest --pyargs hyperspy --dist loadfile -n 2 -k "not load_readonly"
  imports:
    - hyperspy
    - hyperspy.Release
    - hyperspy._components
    - hyperspy._lazy_signals
    - hyperspy._signals
    - hyperspy.api
    - hyperspy.api_nogui
    - hyperspy.axes
    - hyperspy.component
    - hyperspy.components1d
    - hyperspy.components2d
    - hyperspy.datasets
    - hyperspy.decorators
    - hyperspy.defaults_parser
    - hyperspy.docstrings
    - hyperspy.drawing
    - hyperspy.drawing._markers
    - hyperspy.drawing._widgets
    - hyperspy.events
    - hyperspy.exceptions
    - hyperspy.external
    - hyperspy.external.astropy
    - hyperspy.external.mpfit
    - hyperspy.interactive
    - hyperspy.io
    - hyperspy.io_plugins
    - hyperspy.learn
    - hyperspy.logger
    - hyperspy.misc
    - hyperspy.misc.eds
    - hyperspy.misc.eels
    - hyperspy.misc.holography
    - hyperspy.misc.io
    - hyperspy.misc.machine_learning
    - hyperspy.model
    - hyperspy.models
    - hyperspy.roi
    - hyperspy.samfire
    - hyperspy.samfire_utils
    - hyperspy.samfire_utils.goodness_of_fit_tests
    - hyperspy.samfire_utils.segmenters
    - hyperspy.samfire_utils.weights
    - hyperspy.signal
    - hyperspy.signal_tools
    - hyperspy.signals
    - hyperspy.ui_registry
    - hyperspy.utils
  requires:
    - pip
    - pytest
    - pytest-xdist
about:
  dev_url: https://github.com/hyperspy/hyperspy/
  doc_url: http://hyperspy.org/hyperspy-doc/current/user_guide/index.html
  home: https://hyperspy.org
  license: GPL-3.0-or-later
  license_file: COPYING.txt
  summary: Multi-dimensional data analysis
extra:
  copy_test_source_files: true
  final: true
  recipe-maintainers:
    - ericpre
    - francisco-dlp
